channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16405] Change read path Bloom check to work with Cells with out any copy
item.description: Currently the read path though it works with Cells, still does go with the assumption that we need to copy the Cells to KeyValue's key format and then use the byte[] version of hash() function to calculate the Bloom hash. In case of incoming cell's being KeyValue type we try to use the KeyValue.getKey(), KeyValue.getKeyOffset() APIs. With this sub-task we will get rid of all those and things will work with Cells.
item.summary: Change read path Bloom check to work with Cells with out any copy

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Things looks good.
Actually my intention was to say in CompoundBloomFilter#contains(Cell, ByteBuff)


    int block = index.rootBlockContainingKey(keyCell);

    // This copy will be needed. Because blooms work on the key part only.

    // Atleast we now avoid multiple copies until it comes here. If we want to make this to work

    // with BBs then the Hash.java APIs should also be changed to work with BBs.

    if (keyCell instanceof KeyValue) {

      // TODO : directly use Cell here

      return checkContains(((KeyValue) keyCell).getBuffer(), ((KeyValue) keyCell).getKeyOffset(),

        ((KeyValue) keyCell).getKeyLength(), block);

    }

    // TODO : Avoid this copy in read path also

    byte[] key = CellUtil.getCellKeySerializedAsKeyValueKey(keyCell);

remove the above TODO. So there is no longer any need for ByteArrayHashKey. So the HashKey will just have two hierarchy Row and RowColHashKey and you can remove the generic itself and make it work with Cells alone. And if needed modify the test cases. If suppose removing it is totally impossible just for the case of test case then leave the ByteArrayHashKey for test purpose alone and in that case the hierarchy will be as is.

-1 overall

We ween ByteArrayHashKey. We check the hash function with row key for a row get. There create a FirstOnRow cell will be unwanted for hash check.
